caption: A fairy appears before the green-skinned woman and waves her wand, causing the furniture in the room to come to life and dance around. Soon, a green monster and his donkey enter the scene. Shortly after, the fairy departs in a flying carriage. The green-skinned woman and the monster have an argument, leaving the woman in tears. A man named Wang Hao sits on a bed reading a book, while a king paces back and forth in a bedroom. The king then boards the fairy's carriage, accompanied by two guards and a handsome man, all carrying a large axe. The film ends with a scene in a gloomy bar.
